result.title: Chinese Reminder Theorem
result.content:
Hi everyone. I was wondering if someone could help me to find what i missed in my code for this problem problem because i got lot of WA.Here is my code 

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll extendedEuclid(ll a,ll b,ll &x,ll &y){
	ll t,d;
	if(b==0){
		x = 1, y = 0;
		return a;
	}
	d = extendedEuclid(b,a%b,x,y);
	t = x;
	x = y;
	y = t - (a/b)*y;
	return d;
}
ll inverse(ll a,ll n){
	ll x,y;
	extendedEuclid(a,n,x,y);
	return (x<0)?(x+n):x;
}
int main(){
//	freopen("i","r",stdin);
	int t;
	ll a,n,b,m,x,K;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld",&a,&n,&b,&m);
		K = n*m;
		x = ((((a*m)%K)*(inverse(m,n)%K))%K+ (((b*n)%K)*(inverse(n,m)%K))%K)%K;
		printf("%lld %lld\n",x,K); 
	}
	return 0;
}
